entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
